title: What is the easiest way to just win one game in bronze??
body:
Apparently bronze IS SO FUCKING EASY, and even though I've been playing this game for YEARS, i'm actually FUCKING HORRIBLE at it, and can't fucking win at all and it is so fucking hard.

So can someone tell me the secret?  Like what champ do I use that guarantees an easy win?  What strategy do I abuse to guarantee that W???  Because I am trying SO FUCKING FUCKING HARD to win JUST ONE FUCKING GAME, and I cannot fucking win at all FOR 6 GAMES STRAIGHT.

How in the hell can you say this is easy?  I'm trying SO FUCKING HARD and this is SOO FUCKING HARD, so clearly I'm doing it the hard way, and there's like a champ or something that guarantees an easy win without any effort right?

WHAT IS THE SECRET??  I DONT FUCKING SUCK, YOU FUCKING SUCK, I'VE PLAYED THIS GAME FOR YEARS, I KNOW EXACTLY WHAT TO DO AT EVERY STAGE OF THE GAME AND WHAT ITEMS TO GET IF YOUR AHEAD, AND WHAT ITEMS TO GET WHEN BEHIND.  I JUST CAN'T GET A WIN, AND I'M TRYING SO FUCKING HARD.  WHAT DO I DO, PLEASE HELP, I AM DESPERATE.  THIS IS SO HARD.
